    • Method Detail

      • build

        public UctSearch build()
        Returns:
        A new UctSearch agent based on this builder.

      • setNumSimulations

        public UctSearch.Builder setNumSimulations(int numSimulations)
        Parameters:
        numSimulations - Number of simulations to run before picking the best action from the root node. Default value: 100000.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setExplorationBias

        public UctSearch.Builder setExplorationBias(double explorationBias)
        Parameters:
        explorationBias - The multiplier named C_p in the original UCT paper. A higher number places more emphasis on exploration, a lower number places more emphasis on exploitation. Default value: UctSearch.UNIT_EXPLORATION_BIAS.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setDiscountRate

        public UctSearch.Builder setDiscountRate(double discountRate)
        Parameters:
        discountRate - The rate at which rewards should be discounted in the future, used to compute the present value of future rewards. This way, rewards further in the future are worth less. This captures our uncertainty about the future, as well as helping avoid infinite reward cycles, etc. Default value: 1.0 (no discounting).
        Returns:
        this.

      • setMaxDepth

        public UctSearch.Builder setMaxDepth(int maxDepth)
        Parameters:
        maxDepth - The maximum depth the search to in the simulation. Default value: 500.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setNumInitialVisits

        public UctSearch.Builder setNumInitialVisits(int numInitialVisits)
        Parameters:
        numInitialVisits - For the first numInitialVisits to a given game tree position, play random games instead of expanding the tree. This saves memory. Default value: 1.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setEvaluator

        public UctSearch.Builder setEvaluator(Evaluator evaluator)
        Parameters:
        evaluator - Function to use to evaluate the heuristic value of a terminal search node. Default value: WinLossEvaluator.
        Returns:
        this.
